module.title: Resource: Limiter
module.description:
Limiter for resource usage.
This modules allows to limit functionality for usage quantity and quality. You can use this module to limit (if is integrated within module): list> - database model entities - file based entities - user interface functionalities - ... whatever ... depending on module <List
Exceeding a limit can result (depending on module) in: list> - Messenger warning or error - Denial of service - User interface information
This module has a main module activity switch, which need to be turned on. Otherwise it will behave transparent.
module.author: Christian Würker
